title: The 15 best F1 drivers of all time
summary: With Max Verstappen already on four Formula 1 titles, where should he sit in the list of the greatest Formula 1 drivers in history? Here's our latest verdict on the top 15

qa_pairs.question: Who holds the record for the most Formula 1 World Championships?
